title: Calories in Japanese Sweet Potato
meta_description: Discover calories in Japanese sweet potato per 100 g, including carbs, protein, fiber, and full nutrition breakdown for baked servings.
assumptions: Baked Japanese sweet potato (Satsumaimo variety), skin on, no added fats, salt, or toppings; medium moisture content.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, size, cooking method, and growing conditions. Check labels or databases for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of baked Japanese sweet potato provides about 90 kcal and 21 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged foods.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g Japanese sweet potato?
faqs.a: About 90 kcal for baked, skin-on Japanese sweet potato.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in Japanese sweet potato?
faqs.a: Around 21 g carbs per 100 g, including 3.3 g fiber.

faqs.q: Are Japanese sweet potatoes lower in calories than regular?
faqs.a: Similar to regular sweet potatoes at ~90 kcal per 100 g baked.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in Japanese sweet potato?
faqs.a: Baking retains more nutrients; boiling may slightly reduce calories due to water absorption.

faqs.q: Is Japanese sweet potato good for protein?
faqs.a: Modest at 2 g protein per 100 g; pair with proteins for balanced meals.
